name: Pi-hole Service
description: Ensures the Pi-hole FTL (DNS resolver) service is active and restarts it if inactive.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active pihole-FTL >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then if service pihole-FTL status 2>/dev/null | grep -q running; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart pihole-FTL || true; elif command -v service >/dev/null 2>&1; then service pihole-FTL restart || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active pihole-FTL >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
